Select what type of file you are installing from the Home screen.

Installing Layers:
 ******************
 • Click on Button 1 on the home screen "Layers Installer".
 • Click Button 1 on Install Layers screen "Choose Your Layers.zip that you predownloaded".
 • Navigate to your predownloaded layers.zip or individual .apk file that you want to install and click it.
 • Click Button 2 "Install Chosen Layer".
 (you can then check whats installed by clicking Button "Installed Layers").
 • Delete what you don't want before clicking Button 3 "Reboot Your Device"\, for the layers to take effect.
 
 Deleting 1 layer at a time:
 ***************************
 • Click Button 4 "installed Layers".
 • Pick a layer.apk to delete.
 • Check the checkbox then click bottom left button "Delete Your Chosen Layer".
 (you can then click button 4 again to check it was deleted).
 
 Deleting everything in the Installed folder:
 ********************************************
 • Check the checkbox.
 • Click the bottom right button "Delete all Installed Layers".
 (click button 4 again to check they have all gone).
 
 TIPS:
 *****
 • You can package any number of layers.apk's into a folder of your choice then zip the whole folder and install it in one go or just pick the .apk's 1x1.
 • Use the "Installed Layers" Button to check whats currently installed.
 • You also need to reboot after deleting to remove them from your system.
